      • enableErrorChecking

        public void enableErrorChecking(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: IGLErrorUtils
        Enables or disables error checking according to the given value.

        The setting will affect all calls to this utils instance.

        Specified by:
        enableErrorChecking in interface IGLErrorUtils
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable, false to disable.

      • isErrorCheckingEnabled

        Description copied from interface: IGLErrorUtils
        Returns whether error checking for this instance is enabled or not.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • assertNoGLErrors

        public void assertNoGLErrors()
                      throws OpenGLErrorException
        Description copied from interface: IGLErrorUtils
        Checks if there are GL errors and throws an exceptions if there are.

        If error checking is disabled there will be no effect.

        Specified by:
        assertNoGLErrors in interface IGLErrorUtils
        Throws:
        OpenGLErrorException - If there are GL errors.

      • logGLErrors

        public int logGLErrors(String context)
        Description copied from interface: IGLErrorUtils
        Makes a log entry with all GL errors and the given context.

        If error checking is disabled there will be no effect.

        Specified by:
        logGLErrors in interface IGLErrorUtils
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates which context this check is in.
        Returns:
        The number of errors logged.
